text: SummerSlam was a professional wrestling pay-per-view event produced by World Wrestling Entertainment (WWE), which took place on August 17, 2008 at Conseco Fieldhouse in Indianapolis, Indiana. It was the 21st annual SummerSlam event and starred wrestlers from the Raw, SmackDown and ECW brands. ==Results== # Matches Stipulations Times Dark match The Big Show defeated Bam Neely Singles match 11:15 1 Montel Vontavious Porter defeated Jeff Hardy Singles match 09:12 2 Glamarella (Santino Marella and Beth Phoenix) defeated Kofi Kingston (c) and Mickie James (c) Intergender tag team match for both the WWE Intercontinental and WWE Women's championships 05:40 3 Matt Hardy defeated Mark Henry (c) (with Tony Atlas) by disqualification Singles match for the ECW Championship 00:33 4 CM Punk (c) defeated John "Bradshaw" Layfield Singles match for the World Heavyweight Championship 11:12 5 Triple H (c) defeated The Great Khali Singles match for the WWE Championship 09:18 6 Batista defeated John Cena Singles match 13:41 7 The Undertaker defeated Edge Hell in a Cell match 26:43 ==Related pages== *List of WWE pay-per-view events *SummerSlam ==References== == Other websites == *The official website of WWE SummerSlam 2008 *SummerSlam 2008 Microsite (Macromedia Flash Player needed) Category:2008 in professional wrestling Category:SummerSlam Category:History of Indianapolis Category:2008 in American television Category:21st century in Indiana
title: SummerSlam (2008)
